data.name: Godzilla: Omniverse
data.detailed_description:
Overview:
The game revolves around 2d giant monster combat. Engage in close quarter melee, grab attacks, or beam fights. Each character comes with their own unique set of special powers and abilities. All characters have a special "Fury" attack which serves as the most power ability of the character, which can be used to turn the tide of combat at any moment. Some stages include buildings which can act as hazards if monsters are thrown onto them, or if they collapse on top of them.

Design:
All monsters have a basic and heavy attack, crouch and jump variants of these, one to two grab attacks which cannot be blocked, and a run ability that allows faster movement at the cost of stamina. Some characters have combo attacks which are performed by tapping the heavy attack button rapidly in close-range, while others can perform run attacks, or can hover or fly at will. Combine these with the character's powers, abilities and special Fury attack to overcome the enemy.

All monsters are not equal! There are weak monsters as well as strong ones. The game allows players to pick a monster from any tier to fight enemy monsters of any tier. A player using a weak monster can team up with one or more additional weak monsters to go against a stronger one. Or pick a strong monster and fight against a solo enemy or team of weak enemy monsters.

Game Modes:
. Arcade: Select a monster, fight against enemy monsters in a series of battle phases until you reach the most strongest monsters. Can be played solo or in cooperative mode.
. Versus: Go against a friend in either a one-vs-one match or a team setting.
. Spectate: Watch the monsters fight against each other without any player input. Comes with a cycling camera mode to focus on a particular monster in the match, and a free camera movement mode.

Features:
. 40+ monsters (42 in total), either as playable characters or as enemies.
. Full controller support (Xbox controller for Windows).
. Local multiplayer.
. Split or shared screen in versus and cooperative mode.
. Spectate mode to watch the monsters fight among themselves as AI bots.

data.short_description: Play as, and fight against, 40+ monsters and mechas from the Godzilla omniverse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 260
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If receiving a black screen during gameplay, or getting D3D errors, disable shaders from configuration menu.
